text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: A few days after running into<n>Matikanefukukitaru...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Heya! Can I borrow a minute of your<n>time?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: I was thinking about starting mytraining for tryouts today—like, realtraining!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
It was revealed to me through my<n>horoscope that doing well
at the<n>upcoming tryouts is paramount to my<n>success.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Which means that I'll be needing<n>your guidance! That's
okay with you,<n>right?!
choice_data_list: But I'm not even your trainer yet!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
A TV psychic said to "lend your ear to<n>the experts." And
you're an expert<n>trainer, right?! So you gotta train<n>me—you
just gotta!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Matikanefukukitaru won't take no for<n>an answer, so I
finally give in to her<n>request to do some training with her.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Are you serious?! My training is<n>running in a scrimmage?!
choice_data_list: You said you wanted "real training," right?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: I mean, yeah... I did, but...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Thinking that the best way to improve<n>is to gain as much
experience as<n>possible, as quickly as possible, I've<n>
already organized a scrimmage for<n>her.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Howdy there! May the better runner<n>win the race!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Whoa! I'm going against Taiki?!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Your trainer here came to me to ask if<n>I could lend a hand!
It's the least I can<n>do as your friend!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
But you're practically good enough to<n>make your debut!
Trainer, I can't race<n>against her!
choice_data_list: What happened to listening to the experts?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Aaargh! Ya got me there...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Could I at least try reading my fortune<n>first?!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Eko, eko, azure seal! Eko, eko, wall<n>o' rust! Goddess of
victory, heed my<n>call!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She chants some kind of mysterious<n>incantation, pulls a
pencil out of thin air<n>and rolls it on the ground.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Whoa! Great fortunes await me at the<n>end of this race!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: It's decided! I will run in thisscrimmage! Witness me fly fasterthan I've ever flown before!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Ya ready, Taiki?!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
You betcha! I'm locked and loaded!<n>Let's have a little fun,
why don't we?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And so begins the scrimmage<n>between Matikanefukukitaru
and Taiki<n>Shuttle.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Pant... pant... pant...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Wow... Taiki really is something. I'd<n>better pick up the pace!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
I won't lose though! After all, fortune<n>stands by my side
today! Forward—to<n>a glorious future of luck aplenty!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: I lost?! But how?!
choice_data_list: I guess you ran out of luck.
I guess you ran out of luck.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Hrnnng... That's not it at all!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
I need to funnel this frustration into<n>motivation! That's what
my great<n>fortune is—I'm sure of it!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, I need to book it! The next<n>race isn't gonna win
itself! Uwaaah!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Hey, are we done already?! But I<n>wanted to run with ya
some more!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
That night, right as I'm leaving the<n>academy campus, I hear
a strange<n>voice.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Woiya... Haiya... Reveal tonight's<n>lucky track to mine eye!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Huh? Oh, it's you.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Well, I want to go running, but I first<n>need to figure out the
best track to run<n>on! Nothing a little bit of divination<n>can't
solve!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
The great Shiraoki would be<n>displeased if I ever attempted
to rely<n>on luck alone! Good fortune blesses<n>those who
work for it!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Shiraoki is this amazing goddess who<n>appears in my
dreams! She tells me<n>what's lucky and leads me along a<n>
path of great fortune!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
If I'm ever feeling lost, down, or<n>anxious, she cheers me
up—makes<n>me feel better! She even helped me<n>during my
scrimmage with Taiki!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
The reason why I'm even here right<n>now is all thanks to the
great Shiraoki!<n>I chose to believe in her, and that<n>brought
me to where I am today...
choice_data_list: A benevolent and irreplaceable goddess, huh?
A benevolent and irreplaceable goddess, huh?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Spot on! Now you're getting it! She's<n>amazing, isn't she?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
In any case, I need to get back to<n>training! I'm off to the
lucky track!<n>Super Fortune Daaaash!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Wait, what?! Why is there a puddle<n>here?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
These divinations seem to serve as<n>some kind of motivation
for her to<n>fulfill her own desire to run.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Matikanefukukitaru is definitely an<n>Umamusume of many
quirks, but I feel<n>like I'm beginning to see who she<n>really
is behind her shell of fortune.
